ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Cults
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
t click to clear sanity at the cost of a mental break.\nFixed settings menu in Mod Settings.\n
Gameplay expansion for RimWorld.
You can now: *found a cult *worship monstrous deities *make offerings and animal sacrifices *make human sacrifices in return for powerful spells (over 20 in total, plus a dozen side effects)
